definition: the act of choosing or selecting
details:
noun
- the act of choosing or selecting
= synonyms: option, pick, choice
- the person or thing chosen or selected
= synonyms: choice, pick
- a passage selected from a larger work
= synonyms: excerpt, excerption, extract
- an assortment of things from which a choice can be made
= example: an assortment of things from which a choice can be made
- a natural process resulting in the evolution of organisms best adapted to the environment
= synonyms: survival, survival of the fittest, natural selection
